title: Topical
subtitle: Authority
heroDesc: Become the definitive voice in your industry. We create high-intent content that ranks, educates, and converts strangers into advocates.

deliverables.title: Content Refresh
deliverables.desc: Revitalizing old content for modern rankings.

process.title: Keyword Intent
process.desc: Classifying keywords by 'Informational' vs 'Transactional' to map the buyer journey.

process.title: Content Blueprint
process.desc: A structural outline for every piece to ensure it hits all semantic SEO requirements.

process.title: Production
process.desc: Crafting deep-dive articles that are better than anything currently on page 1 of Google.

process.title: Optimization
process.desc: Applying NLP techniques and readability scores to ensure maximum user retention.

process.title: Promotion
process.desc: Distributing content through newsletters and social channels to gain initial 'Heat Signals'.

faqs.a: Consistency beats quantity. We recommend 2-4 high-authority pieces per month over daily low-quality posts.
Yes, all content comes with custom graphics and optimized media to boost engagement.
